abstract: With a pedigree chock-full of legendary cars, the designer Jason Castriota is hoping to begin a new era at the struggling carmaker.
snippet: With a pedigree chock-full of legendary cars, the designer Jason Castriota is hoping to begin a new era at the struggling carmaker.
lead_paragraph: AT last spring’s New York auto show, Jason Castriota worked hard. Hour after hour, he stood explaining to group after group of visitors the idea behind his futuristic Saab PhoeniX concept car.

headline.main: A Vision for Saab, Perhaps Too Late to Save It
headline.print_headline: A Vision for Saab, Perhaps Too Late to Save It
